headline.main: OPTIMISM VOICED ON MINER DISEASE; Conference Expects Black Lung to Be Curbed

docs.abstract: Internatl scientific conf on black lung disease ends; conf chmn Dr Selikoff predicts that disease will have been eradicated a generation from now; urges greater funding for research on diagnosis,' treatment and prevention
docs.lead_paragraph: Miners have long known about the lethal quality of the air they breathed while digging coal from the earth; they recorded their knowledge in song:
docs.snippet: Miners have long known about the lethal quality of the air they breathed while digging coal from the earth; they recorded their knowledge in song:
